DOC.brief_summary: The primary intervention offer study manualized culturally adapt CBT intervention combine exercise intervention , administer trained Community Health Workers exercise trainer ethnic minority elder moderate severe mood symptom risk disability . In addition intervention implementation , study examines successfully build collaborative research provision evidence-based mental health disability prevention treatment ethnic minority elder community-based setting . Thus , study evaluate three component necessary successful intervention : efficacy , since intervention must work , acceptability among client partner agency , feasibility sustainability within organization .
DOC.brief_title: Building Community Capacity Disability Prevention Minority Elders ( Positive Minds - Strong Bodies )
DOC.detailed_description: The researcher partner 5 community-based organization 2 clinic , recruit 60 elder participant randomize either intervention ( CBT+exercise ) control ( enhance usual care ) group . Each participant randomize intervention group receive 10 session individual CBT depression anxiety ( Positive Minds ) , use translate culturally adapt manual , administer trained community health worker . In addition , participant engage three exercise group per week 12 week , use Increased Velocity Specific Task ( Strong Bodies ; InVEST ) protocol . Both intervention control group assess biweekly symptoms depression , anxiety , suicidality , group participate thorough assessment baseline , 2 , 6 , 12 month baseline .
DOC.criteria: Age 60+ Fluency English , Spanish , Mandarin Cantonese Score threshold PHQ9 , GAD7 , Geriatric Depression Scale ( GDSShort Form ) Score within threshold SPPB Participants exclude evidence : Current substance use disorder Current last 3 month specialty mental health treatment Evidence patient participant lack capacity consent assess use UCSD Brief Assessment Capacity Consent . Suicidal risk ( score 4 5 Paykel suicide questionnaire ) , whereby participant refer immediate treatment specialty care If participant 's physician advise strenuous physical exercise . Exclusion disability component also happen participant homebound , acute exacerbate chronic disease , neuromusculoskeletal impairment prevents participate exercise
